title: Understanding alcohol: use and abuse
creator_credit: Walt Disney Educational Media Company and Tad Stones
brief_description: Discusses the physical, mental and social effects of alcohol and describes the four stages of inebriation. Examines the various factors which may lead to the use and abuse of alcohol. Narrated by Ralph Story.
creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Educational Media Company and Tad Stones
